Q_DESC: Oliver is a growing business man in textile industry. He wants to be excellent in both cognitive and social skills.  He wants to improve his sales. He always used to plan ahead of the target at the end of every May month. He has 50 types of products in his industry. He wants his sales always to grow not to reduce.  Design a program for Oliver using the concept of array and pointers to find the increase in sales target in that year.  Input:   The first line contains the no of test cases,  0T=5000,                      The Second line contains two integers n and m. The no of array elements n  defines the no of products oliver wants to imporve sale, and m defines the growth percentage : an integer 0n=50 and  0m=10,    The third line contains the n integers a1,a2, a3, ...anseparated by a space defining the previous sales of each item.     For T test cases the second and third lines are successively entered.                                        Output:  Each item sales improved by a factor of m.  [ m times ai]  If T 0  or T5000    print  Invalid Input   .      If n0 or n100 print Invalid Input     If m0 or m10 print Invalid Input
